children.value: Breadcrumbs are used to show taxonomical context on pages that are many levels deep in a site’s hierarchy. Breadcrumbs show and link to parent, grandparent, and sometimes great-grandparent pages. Breadcrumbs are most appropriate on pages that:
Are many levels deep on a site
Do not have a section-level navigation
May need the ability to quickly go back to the previous (parent) page

1. Business
  2. Customers
  3. MailChimp
